Text: Oh, initial seed is on a 10mbps uplink pipe so will be lots of seeds pretty quickly. Please be kind and reseed after you get the file though. I also have The Daily Show up.

Maybe this is just me, but the file seems to be damaged. It skips like crazy and is unwatchable. I don't know enough about this to know what the problem is, but could it be caused by someone (industry-related) uploading junk data? i thought there were safeguards against that kind of thing nowadays.
Odd. What player do you use? I use VLC and it works perfectly.
